about_the_game:
Candy Bandits is a thrilling 3D top-down multiplayer party game where Guardians and Bandits face off in chaotic team battles! Equip a mix of passive and active abilities, collect powerful one-time actions from action boxes and strategize with your teammates to outsmart the competition.

Your goal? Collect 30 candies to secure victory or stop the enemy team by catching them—teamwork, quick thinking, and clever tactics are your keys to triumph!"

Will you be a Guardian, defending the precious candies scattered across different landscapes, or will you embrace the life of a Bandit set on stealing these delicious treasures?

Actions: Grab one of many action boxes scattered around the maps and use the unique effects to your and your teams advantage!
Actions vary from simple dashes to more complex team-based actions like laying bombs and blinding your enemies!

Abilities: You can not only customize your appeareance, but also your gameplay. Choose one active and up to 3 passive abilities before the round starts. Gain a unique edge over your opponents by customizing your Sugarpaw to your likings!

Maps: Explore a beautifully crafted world divided into distinct areas, each brought to life as a unique playable level. Navigate your choices with a specially designed, visually stunning map. Select your battleground, form your crew, and embark on epic candy heists. It's time to unite friends, break down genre boundaries, and embark on a thrilling adventure like no other!
